actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain property in the State of Maryland for an international center park, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire specified property in the State of Maryland for an international center park. Establishes an International Center Park Advisory Commission. Provides that such Commission shall advise the Secretary in the development and management of this Act. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain property in the State of Maryland for an international center park, and for other purposes.
